bsite.
													                
													                
													                    Nodular Lymphocyte-Predominant Childhood Hodgkin Lymphoma
													                    Treatment of nodular lymphocyte-predominant childhood Hodgkin lymphoma may include the following:         -  Surgery, if the tumor can be completely removed.    -  Chemotherapy with or without low-dose external radiation therapy.
